response.original_title: Les Petits Rats de l’Opéra de Paris : Six mois pour devenir l’élite
response.overview: Seven boys and eleven girls ages 8-10, selected from among several hundred candidates, spend six months at the Paris Opera Ballet School. In July, a final exam will decide whether these young dancers can stay at the school. For these children who have barely reached the age of reason, the pressure is immense and the competition fierce...
response.title: Les Petits Rats de l’Opéra de Paris : Six mois pour devenir l’élite
